mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(userId) FROM users WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(nickName) FROM users WHERE nickName = #{nickName}
SELECT userId FROM users WHERE userId = #{userId} AND userPw = #{userPw}
SELECT userId, nickName FROM users WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT count(*) FROM board WHERE userId = #{userId} and deleteChk = 0

SELECT b.boardNum, b.title, b.regDate, b.viewCnt, ( SELECT count(*) FROM reply r WHERE r.boardNum = b.boardNum and r.deleteChk = 0 ) as replyCnt FROM board b WHERE userId = #{userId} and b.deleteChk = 0 ORDER BY boardNum desc LIMIT #{firstBoardNum}, #{amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM reply WHERE userId = #{userId} and deleteChk = 0

SELECT r.replyNum, r.content, r.regDate, r.depth, r.boardNum, ( SELECT b.title FROM board b WHERE r.boardNum = b.boardNum AND b.deleteChk = 0 ) AS title FROM reply r WHERE r.userId = #{userId} AND r.deleteChk = 0 ORDER BY r.regDate DESC LIMIT #{firstBoardNum}, #{amount}
